snippet.title: SNK 40th ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION - Alpha Mission & Vanguard (PS4) (EU - English)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://snk40th.com/
Pre-order today! http://snk40th.com/purchase.html
Available for PlayStation 4, March 22

Fly the friendly retro skies in two unmistakably classic shooters from SNK! Whether it's unleashing devestation on the ground and in the air in Alpha Mission, or delivering the evil Gond to justice in Vanguard, these two make for a mighty pair that every collector would love to have gracing their shelf! 

The arcade comes home with this amazing assortment of the earliest titles in SNK's illustrious catalog. Celebrate 40 years of titles that changed the landscape of arcade and console libraries across the world, available for the first time in one collection!

Pixel-perfect and chock full of special features like saving anywhere and rewind, this definitive homage to SNK's early years also includes an enormous gallery of rare and detailed production notes and materials.
